faq.title: We Solve Your Most Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our custom software subscription model

questions.question: What happens if I want to cancel the subscription?
questions.answer: We understand that needs change. We offer contracts with minimum periods of 12-24 months to ensure you recover your initial investment. After this period, you can cancel with 60 days notice. We also offer source code transfer options.

questions.question: Who owns the developed software?
questions.answer: We use a shared ownership model. You have exclusive rights over your specific implementation and data, while we maintain rights over the base architecture and reusable components. This allows us to offer you better pricing and continuous evolution.

questions.question: How do you guarantee the software will evolve according to my needs?
questions.answer: We include in each subscription a minimum of 2 significant improvements per year, based on your feedback and usage analysis. Additionally, you have direct access to our product team to request specific features.

questions.question: How long does it take to develop the initial software?
questions.answer: It depends on complexity, but typically between 2-4 months. Simple projects can be ready in 6-8 weeks, while complex systems may take up to 6 months. We provide a detailed timeline after the initial analysis.

questions.question: What technologies do you use?
questions.answer: We select the most appropriate technologies for each project, prioritizing stability, scalability, and ease of maintenance. We typically use modern technologies like React, Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, AWS/Azure, but we always adapt the stack to your specific needs.

questions.question: Can you integrate with our existing systems?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Integration with existing systems is one of our specialties. We work with APIs, legacy databases, ERP systems, CRM, and any tools you already use. Part of the initial analysis includes mapping all necessary integrations.

questions.question: What level of support does the subscription include?
questions.answer: It includes priority technical support during business hours (9am-6pm), with guaranteed response in less than 4 hours. For critical emergencies, we offer 24/7 support. It also includes automatic updates, backups, and proactive monitoring.

questions.question: What if I need urgent changes?
questions.answer: For minor changes and fixes, we include them at no additional cost. For new features or major changes, we evaluate whether they can be included in scheduled improvements or require additional development. We always prioritize critical business needs.

questions.question: How do you guarantee the security of our data?
questions.answer: We implement security best practices: encryption in transit and at rest, multi-factor authentication, regular audits, automatic backups, and compliance with standards like ISO 27001. We can adapt to specific requirements for your sector.
